abstract: Federal prosecutors in Brazil arrest Senator Delcidio do Amaral, important ally of Pres Dilma Rousseff, along with Andre Santos Esteves, chief executive of investment bank BTG Pactual, in connection with investigation into corruption at state-owned oil company Petrobras.
lead_paragraph: A broad investigation into corruption at Petrobras, Brazil’s state-owned oil company, widened with the arrests of a sitting senator and one of the country’s top finance executives.

headline.main: Brazilian Senator and Banker Are Arrested as Petrobras Scandal Widens
headline.print_headline: Brazil Senator and Banker Are Held in Graft Scandal

snippet: A broad investigation into corruption at Petrobras, Brazil’s state-owned oil company, widened with the arrests of a sitting senator and one of the country’s top finance executives.
